answers.answer: Well this depends on you as a person and which medication will work for you as they all work differently and on an individual basis.  Geodon made me even quieter than I already am and I'm already a quiet person while Abilify didn't affect me at all in this respect and Risperdal actually brought out my personality and creative social thinking more than it normally comes out.

well risperdol and abilify are listed as drugs not safe for pregnancy so they are not suitable for me as I want to have a baby...I olanzapine is the safest thing for me. I will just have to change my to a healthy diet and watch my calories to mimimize weight gain. Last time I was on olanzapine I was way more social then I am on zeldox. And I sleep good. zeldox was the catalyst for starting problems with insomnia which I never had before I started zeldox. I really don't like it.

I would just go with olanzapine then, I was just listing off ones I took and citing examples of how they worked for me.  Perhaps you can switch to one with less of a chance of weight gain such as Abilify after your pregnancy is over with if weight gain is enough of an issue for you.
